name: Rome
description: Rome, the capital city of Italy, is renowned for its nearly 3,000 years of globally influential art, architecture, and culture. The city's ancient ruins, such as the Forum and the Colosseum, evoke the power of the former Roman Empire. Visitors can explore the Vatican City, home to the Roman Catholic Church, St. Peter’s Basilica, and the Vatican Museums, which house masterpieces such as Michelangelo’s Sistine Chapel frescoes. Rome also offers a vibrant culinary scene with traditional Italian dishes and bustling markets.
